ViewObject.Name: TransactionLineIssueVO
ViewObject.SQLQuery: select TransactionLineIssueEO.TRANSACTION_ID, TransactionLineIssueEO.TRANSACTION_QTY as IssuedQuantity, TransactionLineIssueEO.CHARGED_QTY, TransactionLineIssueEO.AMOUNT_CHARGED, TransactionLineIssueEO.REMARKS, TransactionLineIssueEO.TRANSACTION_DATE as IssuedDate, TransactionLineIssueEO.unit_price, TransactionLineIssueEO.organization_id, TransactionLineIssueEO.subinventory, TransactionLineIssueEO.locator_id, TransactionLineIssueEO.transaction_header_id, TransactionLineIssueEO.UNIFORM_SET_LINE_ID, TransactionLineIssueEO.REQUISITION_LINE_ID, xurl.LINE_NUMBER, msi.segment1 item_code, msi.description, msi.inventory_item_id, msi.primary_unit_of_measure, xurl.requested_qty, NVL((SELECT SUM(xutl1.transaction_qty) return_qty FROM XX_UMS_TRANSACTION_HEADER_V2 xuth1, XX_UMS_TRANSACTION_LINE_V2 xutl1, XX_UMS_REQUISITION_HEADER_V2 xurh1, XX_UMS_REQUISITION_LINE_V2 xurl1 WHERE xuth1.transaction_header_id=xutl1.transaction_header_id AND xutl1.requisition_line_id=xurl1.requisition_line_id AND xutl1.uniform_set_line_id=xurl1.uniform_set_line_id AND xurl1.requisition_header_id=xurh1.requisition_header_id AND xurh1.requisition_header_id=xuth1.requisition_header_id AND xuth1.transaction_type='R' AND xurh1.requisition_header_id=xurh.requisition_header_id AND xurl1.requisition_line_id=xurl.requisition_line_id),0) Total_Qty_Returned, NVL((SELECT SUM(xutl2 .transaction_qty) issue_qty FROM XX_UMS_TRANSACTION_HEADER_V2 xuth2, XX_UMS_TRANSACTION_LINE_V2 xutl2, XX_UMS_REQUISITION_HEADER_V2 xurh2, XX_UMS_REQUISITION_LINE_V2 xurl2 WHERE xuth2.transaction_header_id=xutl2.transaction_header_id AND xutl2.requisition_line_id=xurl2.requisition_line_id AND xutl2.uniform_set_line_id=xurl2.uniform_set_line_id AND xurl2.requisition_header_id=xurh2.requisition_header_id AND xurh2.requisition_header_id=xuth2.requisition_header_id AND xuth2.transaction_type='I' AND xurh2.requisition_header_id=xurh.requisition_header_id AND xurl2.requisition_line_id=xurl.requisition_line_id ),0) as totalissuedqty, xurl.REQUESTED_QTY-(SELECT SUM(xutl2 .transaction_qty) issue_qty FROM XX_UMS_TRANSACTION_HEADER_V2 xuth2, XX_UMS_TRANSACTION_LINE_V2 xutl2, XX_UMS_REQUISITION_HEADER_V2 xurh2, XX_UMS_REQUISITION_LINE_V2 xurl2 WHERE xuth2.transaction_header_id=xutl2.transaction_header_id AND xutl2.requisition_line_id=xurl2.requisition_line_id AND xutl2.uniform_set_line_id=xurl2.uniform_set_line_id AND xurl2.requisition_header_id=xurh2.requisition_header_id AND xurh2.requisition_header_id=xuth2.requisition_header_id AND xuth2.transaction_type='I' AND xurh2.requisition_header_id=xurh.requisition_header_id AND xurl2.requisition_line_id=xurl.requisition_line_id) as QuantityPending, mc.segment1||'.'||mc.segment2||'.'||mc.segment3 item_category, decode(moh.transaction_quantity ,0,2, moh.transaction_quantity ) onhand_quantity, TransactionLineIssueEO.category_id from xx_ums_transaction_line_v2 TransactionLineIssueEO,xx_ums_requisition_header_v2 xurh, xx_ums_requisition_line_v2 xurl, xx_ums_entitlement_header_v2 xueh, xx_ums_transaction_header_v2 xuth, mtl_system_items msi, mtl_item_categories mic, mtl_categories mc, org_organization_definitions ood, mtl_secondary_inventories_fk_v msinv, mtl_item_locations mil, mtl_onhand_quantities moh where xurh.uniform_set_id = xueh.uniform_set_id and xurh.uniform_set_id = xuth.uniform_set_id and xurh.requisition_header_id = xuth.requisition_header_id and xuth.transaction_header_id=TransactionLineIssueEO.transaction_header_id and TransactionLineIssueEO.inventory_item_id=msi.inventory_item_id and TransactionLineIssueEO.organization_id=msi.organization_id and xurh.requisition_header_id=xurl.requisition_header_id and msi.inventory_item_id=mic.inventory_item_id and msi.organization_id=mic.organization_id and mic.category_id=mc.category_id and msi.organization_id=ood.organization_id and msi.organization_id=msinv.organization_id and msinv.status_code='Active' and msinv.secondary_inventory_name=mil.subinventory_code and mil.organization_id=msi.organization_id and msi.inventory_item_id=moh.inventory_item_id and msi.organization_id=moh.organization_id and mil.inventory_location_id=moh.locator_id and msinv.secondary_inventory_name=moh.subinventory_code
